song_lyrics: Gonḍaḷ gāmmā ne Akshardhāmmā Yogībapa birajya chhe,
Nirmaḷ bhakti prembhāvnā sāchā saj sajāvyā chhe;
Gnāngangā tyā nīrmaḷ vahetī saune snān karāvyā chhe,
Vāṇī amrut pīvā haribhakto sau deshvideshthī āvyā chhe.
Jogīe Gonḍaḷne Gokuḷ banāvyu Gokuḷ banāvyu,
Temā āras pachrangī dhāḷiyā re... Jogīe 1
Hari hete hase chhe hardā thakī,
Kāyam rudiye vase chhe bhagati thakī re... Jogīe 2
Enī mūrti mārā dukhne damo re... Jogīe 3
‘Kāg’ darshan kīdhe bhram bhāngto re... Jogīe 4
title: Jogīe Gonḍaḷne Gokuḷ banāvyu Gokuḷ banāvyu

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-118: Kaag Bapu

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
